paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the TTR gene variant E109V, including penetrance data and individual records.

patients.phenotype: ATTR cardiac amyloidosis with mixed phenotype (cardiac and neurological involvement)

individual_records.evidence_sentence: Moreover, the patient was positive for a mutation in the TTR gene (E109V), confirming ATTRv.
Screening of the patient’s two children was negative for this TTR mutation.
Screening of the patient’s two children was negative for this TTR mutation.

functional_data.summary: The E109V variant is associated with hereditary TTR amyloidosis.

variants.segregation_data: The variant segregates with disease in the proband but not in the children.
variants.additional_notes: The variant was confirmed through genetic testing.
key_quotes: We report the case of a patient diagnosed with TTR cardiac amyloidosis with mixed phenotype, who presented a good clinical outcome under treatment with Tafamidis.
Screening of the patient’s two children was negative for this TTR mutation.

extraction_metadata.notes: Extracted data was clear and well-defined in the text.
